Customizable Screen Recorder Extension
Description:

The Customizable Screen Recorder Chrome extension allows users to easily record their screen directly from the browser. Whether you're capturing an entire screen or just a specific application window, this extension makes it seamless. Designed for convenience, it offers a simple start/stop recording feature that saves your recordings directly to your device.

Features:

One-Click Recording: Start and stop screen recording with a single click from the extension popup.
Customizable Recording: Choose to record the entire screen, a specific application window, or a browser tab.
High-Quality Output: Recordings are saved in high-quality .webm format, ensuring clear video and audio capture.
User-Friendly Interface: The extension is designed to be easy to use, with clear instructions and feedback for the user.
How to Use:

Click on the extension icon in your Chrome browser to open the popup.
Click the "Start Recording" button to begin capturing your screen.
Click the "Stop Recording" button when you're done.
Your recording will be automatically saved as a .webm file, which you can download to your device.
Permissions:
This extension requires screen recording permissions. Please allow access when prompted to enable the recording feature.

Support:
If you encounter any issues or have questions, feel free to reach out to our support team. We're here to help you make the most of your screen recording experience!
